name: Joe Bunny
text: DON!! x1 When Attacking: Up to 1 of your opponent's rested cost 1 or lower characters cannot be set active during their next Refresh Phase.

effect.text: Up to 1 of your opponent's rested cost 1 or lower characters cannot be set active during their next Refresh Phase.

meta.notes: Card marked as SAMPLE, but ID and stats are read from printed text.
